title: Low Energy - Homeopathic Remedies
cleaned_text: The Homeopathic Remedy Sepia is most widely used by women, though men benefit from is as well. Sepia is derived from the ink given off by cuttlefish. Can't find what you are looking for? is from the calcium in oyster shell and is a useful remedy for physical fatigue, muscle weakness and problems due to faulty nutrition. [Avena Sativa](https://homeopathicremediesblog.com/remedies/avena-sativa/) The homeopathic remedy Avena Sativa is made from a wild oat and is in the species that includes cereal grains and the seeds of this plant.
